TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ContextItemManager extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a class that maintains a set of context items published into the designer editing context. This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> contained in the ContextItemManager represents a piece of transient state in a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner>.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, enumerates the context items in the editing context. This enumeration includes prior layers unless the enumerator hits an isolated layer.

Docs.param: The callback for the desired target.
Docs.summary: Represents a helper method that returns the target object for a delegate. If the delegate was created to proxy a generic delegate, this method returns the original object, not the proxy.
